original_text: “Let these words sink into your ears: The Son of Man is about to be delivered into the hands of men.”
korean_text: 이 말을 너희 귀에 담아 두라 인자가 장차 사람들의 손에 넘겨지리라 하시되

sentences.original_text: Let these words sink into your ears
sentences.korean_translation: 이 말을 너희 귀에 잘 새겨두어라

sentences.original_text: The Son of Man is about to be delivered
